4.post_text: Our commitment to sustainable sourcing means that 100% of our fish supply comes from Marine Stewardship Council (MSC)-certified fisheries. While you enjoy your favourite Filet-O-Fish®, we do our part to protect the marine ecosystem and ensure a long-term supply for the future!

My drink coupon suddenly expired after my app was updated... Sent a msg to the helpdesk 1+ week ago but no news at all. Just checked my app and the coupon expired image disappeared completely... Trying to erase any traces of mistake secretly? If u don't intend to give the reward, just don't do it. Why make people clock the stamps and secretly remove them backend. Disappointing...
So what now??! Almost 2 weeks of mocha frappe oos, now forcing ppl to order double mcspicy instead? Ridiculous.

Very disappointed with Yishun Safra  branch. Recently my fries were not cooked and I ordered take away. 2 large fries wasted just like that. Today at 1145am, refill coffee and tea were empty, inform 2 to 3 staffs and they don't bother to do anything about it.

Just to share a bad experience with McDonald’s at CCK CC outlet, few weeks ago a group of our regular EPL Soccer fans went to this outlet to watch the Man U game We arrived before the game start, we order our meals and settle down to watch the game and eat our meals for the first half then on the 2nd half one of the staff came to us to force us to order again if we want to continue to watch the 2nd half at the outlet, we proceed to order again coffee n fries but we were not happy regard to the staff hard tactic forcing us. We just accept it as it is the first time it happened, so we did not make a complaint, But today we went again as per our weekly weekend gathering at the same outlet after the epl game break for country friendly, we were surprise to be told that the cable is not working today. Hope McDonald’s mgmt look into this type of force customers to order again on 2nd half in order to continue watching the game. We spend a lot at this outlet for years without any issue before and now this outlet use this type of tactics to force the customers just to chase us customers away. Why today I decided to write on FB to get attention of McDonald mgmt because it happen that what we were told weeks ago no epl game if we don’t order meals again on games day.
I am trying to order mcdonalds. Your app keeps showing and error and your website keeps kicking me out of order page!!!!😡😡

comments.message:
Get proper training for your staff. They are rude and irresponsible and hygiene standards are lacking. Based on experience with the Branch by Ang Mo Kio Park. 

Got there 11.40pm
Stood at counter. Behind counter was the chubby Filipino (I think) manager. Who was Laughing and joking with a supplier? And giving freebies to the supplier??
I was ignored for at least 5 minutes. Not even a hello, even tho she was standing right at counter. When at least the supplier left, she just walked away, like I wasn’t even there. At least have the courtesy to send someone else to take my order. I am not invisible.

Other staff walking and joking behind counter, Not even an acknowledgement. 
When a Malay boy finally found the time to take my order, there was no proper greeting, not even “hi”. Was standing at the register, joking with his friends, looking elsewhere. Like I said, I waited more than 5 minutes, I am not invisible.

Bad service, rude staff, deliberate ignoring of customer standing by the counter, dirty greasy blurry toilets mirrors, dirty glass doors, even tho staff has time to joke and play around. Even leaving 2 big bags of garbage by front entrance next to customer seating area. Can see the rats at night next to garbage bags. 

Maybe look at your CCTV and provide proper training.
My son ordered a Classic Angus Cheese with an extra Augus Patty. The burger was delivered WITHOUT the extra patty which cost an additional S$2. What is McDonald's going to do?😕

Not only your delivery system but the whole system for waiting food.. 
checking the digital sign board for food collection and told by the staff that the no. shown but doesn’t mean food is ready to serve. The staff had to shout out the no. and customers were all waiting in front of them. Never been a fast food restaurant to wait a meal for half hour. 
Your collection system is totally fail and the staff + customers r all suffered. 
Not sure all branches are like this but the one in waterway point is:(
So Mcdelivery is not available from now onwards? It's not even 4am..
Garbage bags with rats playing around sitting near the entrance next to your customer seating area. If your staff has time to joke and play, kindly remind them to do some proper Housekeeping

Hi, since yesterday I cannot select the Cash on Delivery option while ordering from my App!! Today is the second day, is it a glitch because of the system maintenance or are u letting go off the Cash on delivery system?
This is how sad but expensive McDonald breakfast ... shame of you
Of course offer expires today I'll stick with A&W
Choong Sheng

11.post_text: Dear Valued Customers, we are performing scheduled system maintenance on our McDelivery system from 0400 hours to 0530 hours on 21 March 2018. Therefore, we are unable to accept McDelivery orders through our website, mobile app and hotline during this period. You may wish to visit our 24 hrs restaurants. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience and bear with us in the meantime.

comments.message: Not recommend 👎👎👎
Chocolate pie is no longer available ala-carte? Where's the bacon cheesefries :( Can MCD stop making good food limited edition? :(
Or you could bring back quarter pounders? :(
What's inside my friend's Apple Pie he ate last night? =X  Or is it new Apple Pie?

Dear Macdonald,

Throughout my 32 years of of going Macdonlds at Clementi, today really takes the cake. First the super long waiting time and its long ques. Once at counter the counter person was very hasty. I took out my coupon for the $1 off she direct me to mac cafe. then when ordering wah she didnt hear my order finish want to speedy speedy cast me to the side. already press my orders and miss out my fries order cause she was so busy figuring out why got this coupon how come i didnt know... Cause the store manger came and told her this coupon ya its order at this counter. Else I be treated like a Ping Pong BALL.

I understand there were ALOT people but its common at Clementi from 4pm onwards it will always be FULL HOUSE till 10pm sometimes 12mn. And its so HARD to move about also. The counter staff all were sooo cranky and rude some so fierce. It really puts the mood very bad. As a consumer we will argh i dont want to come here but do I have a choice. 

The other day I show my coupon at mac cafe they say sorry not available here only at mac counters. Aren't Mac cafes PART of macdonalds? the coupon so BIG label mac cafe some more... 

I know you maybe wondering I am someone everything dunno about macdonlds.. but I had work as a floor staff at macdonlds for few months during school holidays so I know the ins and outs. Maybe during my time standard of smiles were VERY important. Now... I dont even see a single smile at front counter anymore all I see are gloomy faces with (WHY ARE YOU HERE BUYING GO EAT SOMETHING ELSE) look. No matter which macdonlds I patronise to all i see is gloomy faces or VERY cranky looks. 

the Management system still needs a better upgrade in places where there are peak hours and need more man power. Have the staff properly trained so that they do not jam the que lines for more then 20-30mins. (that is how long i waited at the line today) Cause the counter lady still had to go complete her first few customers orders by herself and I and everyone at the back were sighing... some left the que cause it was FAR to long. So better management would be great and hopefully there would be a better que system in clementi. If you havent been visiting the stores i think its time you and your marketing teams visit them.
Ordered a small ice milo and it taste so sweet at the bottom and  tasts like water on top when i stir it its like water .

Hi McDonald's, it seems like the name for the character in Happy Meal number 5 is actually Rilakkuma, not Kiiroitori. 
https://www.mcdonalds.com.sg/campaigns/happy-meal/

I left a message yesterday but no reply. Apologies for using this post as way to leave feedback. :)

I would like to recognize the service of Roy and Erzwan of the Changi City Point McDonald branch. I went today, in search of the happy meal toy, I wanted the Rilakkuma ones. I asked Erzwan if they had them available, and he very kindly acceded to check. When he realized there wasn’t, he then turned to his manager, Roy, for help. Roy then went out of his way to search for it and found the last piece for me! I was so so happy, it was even in the design that I’d hoped for. Such dedication and customer-oriented mindset should not go unnoticed! He bothered to entertain my silly request even though he was clearly busy, and also attending to other queries from his team. Send my compliments to the management in recognition of his efforts! Thank you, Roy! :) :D  You definitely made an impact on this happy customer!

McDonald's we ordered mcdelivery and was upset that we are given old toy (snoopy) when the current toy is rilakkuma. Seriously, recycling the old toy when we should be getting the latest toy. A very terrible service!!!

Trying to give a feedback to the manager at the outlet. I talked halfway , not even my 2nd sentence and the manager just went okok will do. What a good service from your manager. How to improve like that?

I would like to give a feedback regarding your meal pricing for the Fish & Fries. I ordered at Fish & Fries Special $9 (with the chocolate pie) and was told that I can't upsize my meal (wanted to upsize the fries and drinks). 

In the end, the floor manager asked me to purchase the normal Fish & Fries Meal $7.90 and upsize it to $8.50 and purchase the chocolate pie ala carte ($1.40) and it made my meal cost $9.90. 

I have heard mixed reports from my friends who purchased the meal and said that the Fish & Fries Special ($9) can be upsized. 

Please kindly look into this matter. Thank you.
MacDonald’s !!! This is the best thing u ever came up with!! Chocolate Pie was indeed flavourful and delicious!!

Got my 1st bite into McDonald's Sweet Chilli Fish Burger. Opt for this instead of their F&C version as i could easily imagine how it taste since they use the same patty for their new burger. 1st glance - sure looks a tad neat. Generous amount of lettuce. 1st bite - right amount of mouth size and crispiness in its thicker-than-tempura-esque fish fillet. Not too oily. Fish to batter ratio is balance. White fish reminds me if a certain pollock rather than the expected pangasius as the flesh was firmer and less flaky. 
Was a tad surprise they actually use Foccacia-type bun as there are bits and traces of tomato/chillies in them. Adequate amount of sauce and its (Thai) sweet chilli-mayo compliments the whole package. Overall, worth going for. Up next, choco pie...
Your sweet chili fish sucks big time. The batter is as hard as a rock and what sweet chili sauce?  Can you spot the sauce?  Like find Waldo
The fish batter is a little too hard.. and the fish itself is tasteless.. sadness.. felt like i was eating a rock.. the choco pie taste like brownie batter.. yums

Honestly, I'm not really a burger lover so usually fast food restaurant burgers don't attract me especially those always on the menu. 

At McDonalds, besides trying the prosperity burger during CNY, this Sweet Chilli Fish Burger will be my next favourite. 

Food:
1.Sweet Chilli Fish Burger
The fish is not oily & best of all, it's crispy. With the spread of vegetables (lettuce, carrot & cabbage)& sweet chilli sauce, it's perfect match. 😉 Unfortunately, McDonalds is not generous with the sweet chilli sauce. Perhaps this could be improved.

2. Fish & Fries
Fish is not oily and served only with tartar sauce. Suggest to have the option to serve with the sweet chilli sauce & that would be great! 

3. Red Bean Pie
Tried the pie & nothing much attracts me. Heard chocolate pie tastes great but not selling though. It's good if McDonalds can have at least 3 different flavors of pies for customers' selection. Saw the variety selection of pies in BKK McDonalds & loved the sweet corn pie. Not sweet & so cripsy. 

Price:
Slightly high for a fast food burger set at $7.50 & fish & fries set at $7.90. 

Optional Serving Service:
This is a good idea especially to family with children, pregnant women and of course customers who love to be served. Giving customers the option to choose whether they wish to be served or not it's definitely a good idea. 

Understood this sweet chilli fish burger is only for a certain period of time. Well it's a pity. Such a delicious dish should be placed on the menu. 😊

 Overall, good try at McDonalds!😉
The fish and fries meal is underwhelming. Too much batter and small fries which costs $9 and thats more expensive compared to the fish and chips meal at a normal western stall at food courts.

19.post_text: It’s Fish Season at McDonald’s®! Introducing the new Fish & Fries and Sweet Chilli Fish Burger. Made of fresh tender fish filet coated in golden crispy perfection. Dive in for a crunch today.

comments.message:
Hi John. Sadly, yes. It is sold out islandwide due to it being well received when it first launched. We hope you managed to try it before it was sold out?

For a limited time,we are offering our apple pie and red bean pie at only $1 each! We hope you'll be able to enjoy our other pies instead. (:

Hi David. We hate to be the bearer of bad news, but our chocolate pie is sold out island wide due to the overwhelming response it received. As it is a promotional item, it won't be coming back anytime soon.

As a gesture of goodwill, we are offering our timeless classics, the apple pie and red bean pie, at only $1 each! We hope you'll enjoy this limited time offer David! (:

Mine was delivered today through Uber. Tasted it and i would say it is pretty good. Just that its crusted pie edges was a tad burnt. The chocolate filling itself is thick and has a custardy-pudding-like taste. Unlike a molten chocolate fudge some may expect it to be. But kinda reminds me of a certain signature dessert served at one of a michelin restaurant at RWS called Chocolate Soup. Overall, good when consume hot.
